title: Weekly LinkedIn usage of registered users 2016
summary: The chart shows the Percentage of Weekly in usage registered users in LinkedIn .
\\n The highest percentages of Weekly are found in the users of 8+_hours ( 53 percentage ) , 0-2_hours ( 53 percentage ) and 5-6_hours ( 54 percentage ) .
\\n The lowest percentage ( 22 percentage ) is in 7-8_hours while in 3-4_hours the level is just over 30 .
gold: This statistic provides information on average number of weekly hours that LinkedIn users spend on the social networking site . During a March 2016 survey , it was found that 53 percent of LinkedIn users only spend zero to two hours on the site per week .
